text.name: sys_description
text.text: Experimental Lua game framework for libretro, following the LÖVE API. Its 2D game framework aims for simplicity and extreme portability. Using lutro, you can develop any kind of 2D retro games, like NES or Genesis games, and run them on a wide range of platforms through RetroArch. Portability is achieved through the libretro API: Lutro is loaded as a plugin in a frontend which takes care of display, audio and inputs. Lutro is software rendered and implements only a subset of the LÖVE API.
